page.title: 05FARMING IN WHALEY BRIDGE
page.content: My name is Lucy Shuker and I live at Elnor Lane Farm Whaley Bridge. At our farm there are all kinds of cattle. We have 95 milking cows they are all Friesians. A Friesian cow produces 5000 litres of milk in a lactation . All our Friesian calves are by AI bulls. We also have 600 pigs . This includes a 100 breeding sows. We keep two boars for breeding purposes. There are approximatly 35 piglets born each week. Each week about 20 pigs are taken to the slaughter . We have a herd of beef cattle these are Charolais and Herefords.
